Posts.EditableText:
As far as I know, the Quest game engine itself allows you to create games for whatever purpose you wish, personal, commercial or otherwise.

Games published on the site, however, would fall under individual copyright. If you want to remake a game that's been done by a game author, you'd have to get the rights to do so from them.
